description: Perfectly located in the heart of Burquitlam, this very clean, freshly painted 3 bed, 3 bath townhome offers a true house-like feel with a large front porch that creates a warm, neighborly vibe. Steps to Skytrain, YMCA, and a beautiful park beside the complex. The main level features an open layout with a modern kitchen, quartz countertops, S/S appliances, and ample cabinet space. Upstairs includes a spacious primary bedroom with ensuite and dual closets, plus two comfortable bedrooms. With 2 parking, 1 storage, and unbeatable walkability, this move-in ready home offers the perfect blend of convenience and community living.
